recipe.title: Tarragon-Cilantro Salsa Verde
ingredients: 2 tablespoons finely chopped scallion (white and light green parts only)
1 medium jalapeño, seeded and finely chopped
1/4 cup plus 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil
instructions: In a medium bowl, mix the scallion with the lime juice and let stand for 10 minutes. Add the anchovy and capers and mash slightly with a fork. Stir in the cilantro, tarragon, jalapeño and olive oil. Season with salt and serve. The salsa verde can be refrigerated overnight.
